problem_names:
lemma val_ifex: 
  "val_ifex (ifex_of_ltl b) s = (\<Turnstile>\<^sub>P) {x. s x} b"

lemma ifex_of_ltl_reduced_bdt_checker: 
  "reduced_bdt_checkers ifex_of_ltl (\<lambda>y s. {x. s x} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y)"

lemma in_entailment: 
  "in_and x y \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x"
  "in_or x y \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y"

lemma mk_and_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y"

lemma mk_and'_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and' x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x and y"

lemma mk_or_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y"

lemma mk_or'_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or' x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x or y"
translations:
lemma G_eq_G_list:
  "\<^bold>G \<phi> = set (G_list \<phi>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<^bold>G \<phi> = set (G_list \<phi>)
by (induction \<phi>) auto

lemma G_list_distinct:
  "distinct (G_list \<phi>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distinct (G_list \<phi>)
by (induction \<phi>) auto
subsection \<open>Propositional Equivalence\<close>

fun ifex_of_ltl :: "'a ltl \<Rightarrow> 'a ltl ifex" 
where
  "ifex_of_ltl true = Trueif"
| "ifex_of_ltl false = Falseif"
| "ifex_of_ltl (\<phi> and \<psi>) = normif Mapping.empty (ifex_of_ltl \<phi>) (ifex_of_ltl \<psi>) Falseif"
| "ifex_of_ltl (\<phi> or \<psi>) = normif Mapping.empty (ifex_of_ltl \<phi>) Trueif (ifex_of_ltl \<psi>)"
| "ifex_of_ltl \<phi> = IF \<phi> Trueif Falseif"

lemma val_ifex: 
  "val_ifex (ifex_of_ltl b) s = (\<Turnstile>\<^sub>P) {x. s x} b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. val_ifex (ifex_of_ltl b) s = {x. s x} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P b
by (induction b) (simp add: agree_Nil val_normif)+

lemma reduced_ifex: 
  "reduced (ifex_of_ltl b) {}"
by (induction b) (simp; metis keys_empty reduced_normif)+

lemma ifex_of_ltl_reduced_bdt_checker: 
  "reduced_bdt_checkers ifex_of_ltl (\<lambda>y s. {x. s x} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. reduced_bdt_checkers ifex_of_ltl
     (\<lambda>y s. {x. s x} \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y)
by (unfold reduced_bdt_checkers_def; insert val_ifex reduced_ifex; blast)

lemma [code]: 
  "(\<phi> \<equiv>\<^sub>P \<psi>) = equiv_test ifex_of_ltl \<phi> \<psi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<phi> \<equiv>\<^sub>P \<psi> = equiv_test ifex_of_ltl \<phi> \<psi>
by (simp add: ltl_prop_equiv_def reduced_bdt_checkers.equiv_test[OF ifex_of_ltl_reduced_bdt_checker]; fastforce)

lemma [code]: 
  "(\<phi> \<longrightarrow>\<^sub>P \<psi>) = impl_test ifex_of_ltl \<phi> \<psi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<phi> \<longrightarrow>\<^sub>P \<psi> =
    impl_test ifex_of_ltl \<phi> \<psi>

by (simp add: ltl_prop_implies_def reduced_bdt_checkers.impl_test[OF ifex_of_ltl_reduced_bdt_checker]; force)

\<comment> \<open>Check Code Export\<close>
export_code "(\<equiv>\<^sub>P)" "(\<longrightarrow>\<^sub>P)" checking
subsection \<open>Remove Constants\<close>

fun remove_constants\<^sub>P :: "'a ltl \<Rightarrow> 'a ltl"
where
  "remove_constants\<^sub>P (\<phi> and \<psi>) = (
    case (remove_constants\<^sub>P \<phi>) of
        false \<Rightarrow> false
      | true \<Rightarrow> remove_constants\<^sub>P \<psi>
      | \<phi>' \<Rightarrow> (case remove_constants\<^sub>P \<psi> of 
          false \<Rightarrow> false 
        | true \<Rightarrow> \<phi>' 
        | \<psi>' \<Rightarrow> \<phi>' and \<psi>'))"
| "remove_constants\<^sub>P (\<phi> or \<psi>) = (
    case (remove_constants\<^sub>P \<phi>) of
        true \<Rightarrow> true
      | false \<Rightarrow> remove_constants\<^sub>P \<psi>
      | \<phi>' \<Rightarrow> (case remove_constants\<^sub>P \<psi> of 
          true \<Rightarrow> true 
        | false \<Rightarrow> \<phi>' 
        | \<psi>' \<Rightarrow> \<phi>' or \<psi>'))"
| "remove_constants\<^sub>P \<phi> = \<phi>"

lemma remove_constants_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P \<phi> \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P remove_constants\<^sub>P \<phi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P \<phi> =
    S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P remove_constants\<^sub>P \<phi>
by (induction \<phi> arbitrary: S) (auto split: ltl.split)
subsection \<open>And/Or Constructors\<close>

fun in_and
where
  "in_and x (y and z) = (in_and x y \<or> in_and x z)"
| "in_and x y = (x = y)"

fun in_or
where
  "in_or x (y or z) = (in_or x y \<or> in_or x z)"
| "in_or x y = (x = y)"

lemma in_entailment: 
  "in_and x y \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x"
  "in_or x y \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lbrakk>in_and x y; S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x) &&&
    (\<lbrakk>in_or x y; S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P y)
by (induction y) auto

definition mk_and
where
  "mk_and f x y = (case f x of false \<Rightarrow> false | true \<Rightarrow> f y 
    | x' \<Rightarrow> (case f y of false \<Rightarrow> false | true \<Rightarrow> x' 
    | y' \<Rightarrow> if in_and x' y' then y' else if in_and y' x' then x' else x' and y'))"

definition mk_and' 
where
  "mk_and' x y \<equiv> case y of false \<Rightarrow> false | true \<Rightarrow> x | _ \<Rightarrow> x and y"

definition mk_or 
where
  "mk_or f x y = (case f x of true \<Rightarrow> true | false \<Rightarrow> f y 
    | x' \<Rightarrow> (case f y of true \<Rightarrow> true | false \<Rightarrow> x' 
    | y' \<Rightarrow> if in_or x' y' then y' else if in_or y' x' then x' else x' or y'))"

definition mk_or'
where
  "mk_or' x y \<equiv> case y of true \<Rightarrow> true | false \<Rightarrow> x | _ \<Rightarrow> x or y"

lemma mk_and_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y

have X: "\<And>x' y'. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (if in_and x' y' then y' else if in_and y' x' then x' else x' and y')
    \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x' and y'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x' y'.
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
       (if in_and x' y' then y'
        else if in_and y' x' then x' else x' and y') =
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x' and y'
using in_entailment

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>in_and ?x ?y; ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?y\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?x
  \<lbrakk>in_or ?x ?y; ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x' y'.
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
       (if in_and x' y' then y'
        else if in_and y' x' then x' else x' and y') =
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x' and y'
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
  (if in_and ?x' ?y' then ?y'
   else if in_and ?y' ?x' then ?x' else ?x' and ?y') =
  S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?x' and ?y'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y
unfolding mk_and_def ltl.split X

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((f x = true \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f y) \<and>
     (f x = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
     (\<forall>x3.
         f x = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3)) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3a.
             f y = p(x3a) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and p(x3a)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P p(x3) and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x4.
         f x = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4)) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4a.
             f y = np(x4a) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and np(x4a)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P np(x4) and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x51 x52.
         f x = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow>
          S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x51 and x52) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51a x52a.
             f y = x51a and x52a \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
             (x51 and x52) and (x51a and x52a)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x51 and x52) and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x61 x62.
         f x = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow>
          S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x61 or x62) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61a x62a.
             f y = x61a or x62a \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and (x61a or x62a)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (x61 or x62) and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x7.
         f x = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7a.
             f y = X x7a \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and X x7a) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P X x7 and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x8.
         f x = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8a.
             f y = G x8a \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and G x8a) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P G x8 and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x9.
         f x = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9a.
             f y = F x9a \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and F x9a) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101 x102.
             f y = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P F x9 and x101 U x102)) \<and>
     (\<forall>x101 x102.
         f x = x101 U x102 \<longrightarrow>
         (f y = true \<longrightarrow>
          S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102) \<and>
         (f y = false \<longrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P false) \<and>
         (\<forall>x3.
             f y = p(x3) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and p(x3)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x4.
             f y = np(x4) \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and np(x4)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x51 x52.
             f y = x51 and x52 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and (x51 and x52)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x61 x62.
             f y = x61 or x62 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and (x61 or x62)) \<and>
         (\<forall>x7.
             f y = X x7 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and X x7) \<and>
         (\<forall>x8.
             f y = G x8 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and G x8) \<and>
         (\<forall>x9.
             f y = F x9 \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and F x9) \<and>
         (\<forall>x101a x102a.
             f y = x101a U x102a \<longrightarrow>
             S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x101 U x102 and x101a U x102a))) =
    S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y
by (cases "f x"; cases "f y"; simp)

proof (state)
this:
  S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x and f y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma mk_and'_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and' x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x and y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_and' x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x and y
unfolding mk_and'_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
    (case y of true \<Rightarrow> x | false \<Rightarrow> false
     | _ \<Rightarrow> x and y) =
    S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x and y
by (cases y; simp)

lemma mk_or_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y

have X: "\<And>x' y'. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P (if in_or x' y' then y' else if in_or y' x' then x' else x' or y')
    \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x' or y'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x' y'.
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
       (if in_or x' y' then y' else if in_or y' x' then x' else x' or y') =
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x' or y'
using in_entailment

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>in_and ?x ?y; ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?y\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?x
  \<lbrakk>in_or ?x ?y; ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x' y'.
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
       (if in_or x' y' then y' else if in_or y' x' then x' else x' or y') =
       S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x' or y'
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
  (if in_or ?x' ?y' then ?y'
   else if in_or ?y' ?x' then ?x' else ?x' or ?y') =
  S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P ?x' or ?y'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y
unfolding mk_or_def ltl.split X

proof (prove)

proof (state)
this:
  S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or f x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P f x or f y

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma mk_or'_correct: 
  "S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or' x y \<longleftrightarrow> S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x or y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P mk_or' x y = S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x or y
unfolding mk_or'_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P
    (case y of true \<Rightarrow> true | false \<Rightarrow> x
     | _ \<Rightarrow> x or y) =
    S \<Turnstile>\<^sub>P x or y
by (cases y; simp)
end
